title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:exhaust'
- Applies exhaustion to the player over time.

interval.description: Duration of ticks to wait between applying exhaustion.

exhaustion.description: How much exhaustion will be applied each interval.
